alert.note: Alert for Chase; Hayes; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Perkins, northeastern Chase and northwestern Hayes Counties through 930 PM CDT/830 PM MDT/... At 844 PM CDT/744 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Madrid, or 14 miles northeast of Imperial, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Imperial, Madrid, Elsie, Enders, Grainton, Wanamaker State Wildfire Management Area and Center Dam Campground. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 41 and 64. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT/1100 PM MDT/ for southwestern Nebraska.
